name: Flickr: a bit smaller font size on photo page
description: Reduces the font size for almost every text element on the new photo page. Also makes the full EXIF block a bit better readabe by dimming EXIF field names. Do not use this style with default super-thin font unless you are going to break your eyes. Please, install this style to replace Proxima Nova font with default sans-serif one. Another option to consider for font improvement - making the photo title bold by this style
